# Real-World Application

## Case Study: DAO Hack (2016)

Attacker exploited reentrancy vulnerability in The DAO smart contract, stealing $60 million in Ethereum.

**Vulnerability**: Contract sent funds before updating balance, allowing recursive calls.

**Impact**: Led to Ethereum hard fork (ETH vs ETC split).

**Lessons Learned**: Smart contract security audits are critical. Simple coding mistakes can have massive financial consequences.
